testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When user opens url "https://tutorialsninja.com/demo/index.php?route=account/login".passed And user enters email as "peter786@gmail.com" and password as "7867867860"..passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then user click on MyAccount link...........................................passed And user click on logout link...............................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
